text:
Question 173) A company has several employees. One of them is the manager, who receives $ 1,000 a week. The other employees are day laborers. Each of them works 2 days a week, receiving $ 80.00 per day worked.
Calling X the total number of employees of the company, the amount Y, in reais, that this company spends weekly to pay its employees is expressed by
A) y = 80x + 920.
B) y = 80x + 1 000.
C) y = 80x + 1 080.
D) y = 160x + 840.
E) Y = 160x + 1 000.
